text: @BethRigby Many are assuming that this test and trace fiasco is simply more of their trademark incompetence, but even a cursory glance reveals yet more data harvesting for criminal purposes a la https://t.co/Q7WTE5YBYF. #bbcqt #BBCQuestionTime #COVID19 #TestandTrace
